data.title: To Hire or Not to Hire: Successful Hiring for Solopreneurs with Jamie Van Cuyk — Erica Goode, CPA for Coaches & Consultants
data.meta_description: In this must-listen episode, we delve into the crucial decision of converting your business to an S-corp. Is it the right move for your business in its early years? What about as you approach retirement? Plus, we explore the implications for those juggling a W-2 job alongside their consulting gig.
data.text:
2/6/24 - To Hire or Not to Hire: Successful Hiring for Solopreneurs with Jamie Van Cuyk

Get my Monthly Newsletter here

Congratulations - your business is growing!

Welcome to part 1 of the 2-part mini-series “To Hire or Not to Hire.” As a business owner, whether you choose to stay solo or grow a team is your decision. Think about your needs, your business model, and what’s right for you. Then take the time to listen to this episode and the next, and move forward.

Either way can be profitable!

Find the answer to these questions inside…

What are the critical factors for small business owners to consider when hiring their first employee?

How can small business owners identify the right time to expand their team?

What are the differences in hiring needs between solopreneurs and businesses with up to 200 employees?

What strategies can help determine the best first hire for a small business?

How does understanding business bottlenecks aid in making effective hiring decisions?

How can small business owners develop a clear picture of their ideal candidate?

And more!

Book referenced in this episode:

Turn the Ship Around, by David Marquet

Reach out to Jamie:

On her website - growingyourteam.com

Listen to the Growing Your Team podcast - on Spotify: https://spoti.fi/3OnCL1M

Follow her on Instagram - @growingyourteam

In the meantime, may your week be filled with easy hiring, and lots of profit…
